on_enter.say: Right, let's heat up a 28cm frying pan on high. Once it's nice and hot, drizzle in some olive oil and add the spring onions, spinach, chopped salmon, and lemon zest. You'll start to smell those amazing aromas!

steps.descr: Let it bubble away for 4 minutes, or until the pasta has absorbed most of the water and you've got a nice sauce.

on_enter.say: Brilliant! Turn off the heat, squeeze in that fresh lemon juice, and stir in the cottage cheese and Parmesan. Give it a taste and season to perfection. You're going to love this!
